description:
* Based on a dark fantasy shounen manga by http://anidb.net/cr59303 [Akutami Gege].
A veil abruptly descends over the busy Shibuya area amid the bustling Halloween crowds, trapping countless civilians inside. http://anidb.net/ch107605 [Gojou Satoru], the strongest jujutsu sorcerer, steps into the chaos. But lying in wait are curse users and spirits scheming to seal him away.
http://anidb.net/ch107128 [Itadori Yuuji], accompanied by his classmates and other top-tier jujutsu sorcerers, enters the fray in an unprecedented clash of curses — the Shibuya Incident.
In the aftermath, ten colonies across Japan are transformed into dens of curses in a plan orchestrated by http://anidb.net/ch115205 [Kamo Noritoshi], the most wicked sorcerer in history. As the deadly Culling Game starts, Special Grade sorcerer http://anidb.net/ch152976 [Okkotsu Yuuta] is assigned to carry out Yuuji`s execution for his perceived crimes.
Source: GKIDS
Note: A compilation of the http://anidb.net/a17196 [second season], "Shibuya Incident," along with the first two episodes of the http://anidb.net/a18363 [third season].

titles.title: Gekijouban Jujutsu Kaisen "Shibuya Jihen Tokubetsu Henshuuban" x "Shimetsu Kaiyuu Senkou Jouei"
Jujutsu Kaisen: Execution - Shibuya Incident x The Culling Game Begins
劇場版 呪術廻戦「渋谷事変 特別編集版」×「死滅回游 先行上映」
